name: Open Spaces

name: Guess the number
shortDesc: It is a small game on a page that generates a random number between 1 and 100 each time it loads. The user must find out the random number.

name: Jokers del Script
shortDesc: It is a website that allows you to create business cards. This project was made in a group of 5 people.

name: Las Faraonas
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, React.js, NodeJS, Express, SQL
shortDesc: The goal of this website, besides creating business cards, was to migrate the project from JS to React, connect it to the backend and work with legacy code. This project was made in a group of 5 people.

name: Harry Potter character search engine
alt: Harry Potter character search engine web page
shortDesc: It is a web made in React.js that takes data from an API and allows to search for characters through different filters.
